message.subtitle: We are General Supplier, Fabrication, Machining, Mechanical, Electrical, and Civil company.
message.description-one: PT Trijaya Berkah Mandiri has been operating since 2015, established under Notarial Deed No.1 dated November 4, 2015. Throughout our journey, we have provided a wide range of products for both large and small-scale projects, as well as services for various works and workshops, predominantly serving the western Banten region and extending to parts of Java, Sumatra, and Kalimantan.
message.description-two: As a leading General Supplier and Project provider, PT Trijaya Berkah Mandiri meets the needs of businesses in the fields of Electrical Special Panel Making, Mechanical, Engineering, Safety, and other related projects. In 2019, we expanded into the construction sector. We are dedicated to serving with utmost care and supporting our customers’ needs, whether for large or small-scale projects.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: Meeting the needs of the industrial sector in manufacturing production machines, we also provide high-quality fabrication and repair services for parts. This helps reduce reliance on foreign products and supports the growth of domestic production capabilities.

mission.title: Missions
mission.description-one: Provide services for manufacturing machines, as well as producing and repairing high-quality production machine parts. This ensures customer satisfaction and trust, fostering strong and lasting partnerships.
mission.description-two: Support the government’s efforts to create jobs, reduce unemployment, and boost the national economy, contributing to the well-being of Indonesian families.
